descriptionHtml:
Hello ppl, 

This mod is a fusion of 2 mods i allready made Plz watch the video for instructions 

!!!!dragonborn and dawnguard dlc are required!!!!! 

Important!!! People who had this mod allready and get the updates now should deinstall the mod and save the game without it and reinstall could be buggy if you do not ! If you got the mod the first time now dont worry and read below
[youtube]NSQdj0k4Ch0[/youtube]           [youtube]pBz--pFxylM[/youtube]
[youtube]ITal13r5CrY[/youtube]             [youtube]sPyxQDWkbIQ[/youtube]


What does it add?:
A Dragon near Riverwood 
He can be controlled with some spells that will added when you read the book he gives to you
the spell book can be found behind the sawmill on a tree stump
but you dont need to search it if you do not remove the do not remove weapon =)

Actions so far:

Riding
Inventory with dragon skins
Hover
Fly to desired position controlled by spells
Landing
and he will follow you every where until you send him away


small Update:
-Gave shiriru a Dragon summon spell 
-added a big player house near the breeding place
-made reeklings not follow you anymore
-soon i furnish the houses and make some more dragon races

Small update:
added a Poison Shout to poison dragons with custom textures gave them the cyclone shout too
added a new spell : pearch lets the dragon land (if possible) on houses or places where dragon land markers are anyway if there is no marker near he just lands where the spell hits. Somethimes it can be buggy 
Changed the hover spell works stable now

Update 4: 
made breeding messages smoother , dragon kids now limited to 4 dragons. 
Dragon kids can die !! but you can get always new ones, 
added random dragon affinity , dragon kids can be -poison,ice,fire it will be decided 
when the dragon has fully grown up. 
made the follow system nearly bug free made some stuff for future updates 

Update 3:
added Dragon Breeding : select the option while talking with Shiriru 
he will fly (after you mountet him) to his wife and create an egg , after some time you\'ll get a message That the egg will soon hatch (the egg gets bigger over time ), then you need to activate the egg and a new dragon comes out .
He is small and maybe has some bugs with animations, and he will stay at his mom till he gets big enough to follow his father Shiriru.
when this happens he will follow you, or the last place where you hit a land or hover or call spell

atm you can create infinity Dragons but you cant create them while one is breeding
and breeding realy takes some time



Things to Remember:

-Remember do not remove the weapons given by any spell (you can do but dragon will stop do anything)
-Sometimes it takes a while till the dragons react just wait a bit
-Remember to save the game and reload if the dragon does not talk (dialog box bug)

Plz do not steal my work without credit me
Remember To Press like and favor if you like my mod


This is for people that do not want to use SKSE
author: AluCard
